thread.title: This is hands down my favorite phone case — I've been using it since the iPhone 4
thread.title_full: This is hands down my favorite phone case — I've been using it since the iPhone 4 - Business Insider

author: Ellen Hoffman
title: This is hands down my favorite phone case — I've been using it since the iPhone 4
text:
The Insider Picks team writes about stuff we think you'll like. Business Insider has affiliate partnerships, so we may get a share of the revenue from your purchase.
Incipio
In my capacity as an editor, I've had the opportunity to test out countless phone cases, ranging from the protective to the stylish to the battery-saving to the card-holding.
Since switching from my beloved Blackberry to an iPhone 4s in December 2012 (I was a late adopter of Apple products), none has served me better than the case you see pictured on the right.
This is hands down my favorite iPhone case. It’s from a tech accessories company called Incipio . I’ve been using it since the iPhone 4s and have bought it for every upgrade I’m made since then. Thankfully, Incipio has also rolled out the case for the latest iPhones, the 7 and 7 Plus . So I'm covered — literally — when I'm eligible for an upgrade.
Not only does it protect my phone, it houses convenient storage for up to three credit cards. I use it to stow my MetroCard for easy access on my commute to and from work. It’s one less thing I have to remember to bring with me — if I have my phone on me, I have my MetroCard, too.
It doesn’t feel or look all that flashy, but it has the basics down pat. If you're in the market for a case for your new iPhone, or you're simply looking for a case that's a bit more practical for your day-to-day, I can't see you being disappointed with this one from Incipio. It has treated me well through a handful of phone upgrades, plenty of accidental drops, and countless subway rides to work, and I don't plan on switching anytime soon.
As a bonus, if you're sticking with an iPhone 6-era phone for a bit, the Stowaway case has never been cheaper; the 6s is going for as low as $13.55 and the 6s Plus for as low as $10.95 .
Incipio Stowaway Card Case with Integrated Kickstand for iPhone 7, $18
Incipio Stowaway Card Case with Integrated Kickstand for iPhone 7 Plus, $18
This article was originally published on 9/21/2016.
